section.96: Holding Fast to the Qur'an and Sunnah

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Jews brought a man and a woman who had committed illegal sexual intercourse, to the Prophet (ﷺ) and the Prophet (ﷺ) ordered them to be stoned to death, and they were stoned to death near the mosque where the biers used to be placed
